name: Hey:)
description: The number of reported cases of bullying among children continues to increase year after year. It is always believed that the only protagonists in these cases are the bully and the bullied, but it's not like that. In this conversational adventure, we're going to count as those third parties who witness these atrocious activities can make a substantial and vital to those who suffer from it. We come to tell how a simple message can be the source of an indestructible fortress. Why? Because the human being is more powerful if he feels the company and the respect of their peers, when they all come together for the same purpose: to stop bullying.
